title: Judaeo Christian Heritage in History: A Critique
description:
Are "Judaeo Christian" values the sole reason the West advanced in history? I think not. I discuss my thought, prompted by call tweeted out by Ben Shapiro during the burning of Notre Dame. I ended up engaging in a discussion with Grievance Studies scholar James Lindsay on this subject with his own concerns, and the result is this video with my musings on the matter.

Article I reference on the history of the term "Judaeo-Christian"
https://www.ncronline.org/news/opinion/distinctly-catholic/mark-silk-history-term-judeo-christian

Follow me here:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
